meanings.definition: A person or tool that organizes items in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: The alphabetizer quickly sorted the files into alphabetical order.
meanings.sent2: The office uses an alphabetizer to organize documents efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The alphabetizer at the library had a knack for putting books in perfect order.
meanings.sent4: She was like an alphabetizer of thoughts, neatly arranging ideas in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The alphabetizer worked diligently, ensuring every name was in its correct place.

meanings.definition: To arrange items in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: She alphabetized the books on the shelf using the alphabetizer tool.
meanings.sent2: Remember to alphabetize the list of names before sending out the invitations.
meanings.sent3: He alphabetized his movie collection, much to the amusement of his friends.
meanings.sent4: The teacher alphabetized the students' names like a pro, making it look easy.
meanings.sent5: The task of alphabetizing the files was made simpler with the help of the alphabetizer software.
